description: This time we flew too close to the sun. Dragonlily started off with a great Rocker ride, then a super hammer fuck in #1 and #2. By the time we got to trying a DP, she was showing signs of strain, and the final donkey leg was just too much. All I can say is Dragonlily, I think you are the best, thanks for a great shoot.
title: DragonLily
